summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3128 for the improvement of Fourth Avenue West, from the south margin of West Smith Street to West Ray Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 38201, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
